item.description:
One of Boston's hottest new bars, Howl at the Moon, just opened last week. "Howl At The Moon is home to the World’s Greatest Rock ‘N’ Roll Dueling Piano Show! Our highly talented entertainers will tickle the ivories as well as your funny bones all night while playing the best music from the 70’s to today. We are the perfect spot to party! Audience participation is a must at this dueling piano bar, so be ready to clap, sing, dance, and howl!"

You can get a $40 gift certificate for the price of $20 at the following link (gift certificates are on sale until Aug 26):
http://www.buywithme....

Howl at the Moon is a bar, well-know for it drink menu, but it does also have some pub food. Cover charge is $5 before 7pm and $7 after the show begins. Here's the link for details about the location: http://www.howlatthem...

Since there is often a line, we're going to meet out front at 6:30 so we can find some tables near each other. The show begins at 7pm and runs until 10pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting out front

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dueling Piano Show at Howl at the Moon
